content:
Hi everyone...,

I'm still in the process of converting a module which uses Entity...

I want to create a test module from scratch to experiment with and create a custom schema (I know how to do this) but then want to manipulate it with Entity and Entity_plus etc...

I thought the best way would be to create a module from scratch rather than trying to work out how the module creator did it in Drupal. The changes to Entity, and trying to find what's changed has been a struggle.

So, I could do with a pointer to a tutorial that will work for BD on how to create Entities if anyone knows a source or website etc...

Thanks in advance.

Steve
I think the entity module's tests might help with how to set up a simple entity

Herb said:

I think the entity module's tests might help with how to set up a simple entity

Thanks Herb
